name: Ante of the Gods
description:
A pantheon of gods depends upon its worshipers for power, and each deity seeks to claim all that power for themselves. Their battles are waged through bidding their own power -- in other words, sacrificing their worshipers! With each successful bid, gain more worshipers and subdue your opposing deities.

This game only requires a mouse to play.

Update: Fixed a bug where deity images failed to load.
